ygData.subject: Re: Brewing
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, brewing does net some cash, actually.  If you knuckle down and ignore your arm falling asleep, 40pp (some claim 60pp) for an hour s time is not too bad,
ygData.messageBody:
Well, brewing does net some cash, actually. If you knuckle down and ignore
your arm falling asleep, 40pp (some claim 60pp) for an hour's time is not
too bad, really. Was with brewing I brought my bank account from a few
silver to afford a combine. I have a druid friend who was going to retire
at level 19 just because he couldn't afford his spells! But now he brews.
And brews. And brews. (I almost feel guilty for explaining the trade to
him.)

Apparently there is some bard on your very server, Fenin Ro, around level 8
or 9, selling Bog Juice. I have no idea where to even start with respect to
experimenting with recipies for it. The EQBrewers list is fairly worthless
in this respect, just folks arguing and ranting--no real exchange of
information for Bog Juice. The recipe will likely be shared there last,
too, when the secret's out. Anyone know where this flaming sword Paladin
quest even starts so I can look into it and experiment for this new
libation?

As for bards and drinking, ah just like the old Bard's Tale. Mages had
mana, bards had their booze. I kind of play it that way too, hehe.

For level 19, been to Unrest? Or Permafrost?

Roop

>From: "Ward Family" <jajward@...>
snip
>Thanks
>Cleaver, Fennin Ro
